name: JellyTale
description:
This game was made during the LudumDare 45.

A game about a Jelly wich is in a game in dev, it need to find the exit of the narrator world and pissing him off

GAME BY:

Valentin Denat - Designer

Pierre Rencruel - Designer

Victor Chedeville - Artist

Matis Faucheux - Programmeur

Inputs:

A & D : Move left & right

Space: Jump

Shift: Sprint

E: Dash
